system.description: 1/Violence, when you rush, you can teleport your speed instead. If you're not adjacent to any ally at the end of the teleport, gain Stealth and +1d on your next attack.
system.flavor: The Decapitation Rite teaches that the shadows are your friends. The darkness is not evil; in fact, it is a respite and a safe space from the overbearing hegemony of the sun's scorching rays. Therefore use it to your advantage, and let your axe burn with love.
